I have wasted quite a bit of my life playing this game, would recommend 10/10. There are many gamemodes, my favourite of which is surf. It is lots of fun to play with friends... or by urself :(

UPDATE 25 JUL 22: Probably not worth ur time.

I was at uni when a classmate of mine asked me if I have ever played CSGO, i told him that i hadn't. That very day i started playing 5+ years ago now, and i was hooked on the game ever since.

This game is worth it !!
